name: Bob The Bug
description:
Bob has managed to escape from a lab during an accident and now he is trying to find his way deep into the woods.

  • Move - WASD
  • Bite - Space

Devouring the following animals gives you the abilities:

  • Bird - to fly
  • Frog - to swim
  • Mole- to dig
  • Mouse and Rabbit - to change your size.
